type: Standing Offer Request for Language Schooling
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Provide language training services for learning a second language (English or French) for learners in the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer
## Solicitation Number
WS4602724232

## Published Date
June 3, 2024

## Closing Date
July 12, 2024 @ 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

## Notice Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking Standing Offers from qualified contractors to deliver second language training services for learners in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contract Value
The anticipated value of this contract is from $0.00 to $20,000,000.00 CAD.

## Mandatory Requirements
- Language schooling (UNSPSC: 86111700)
- Request for Standing Offer (Notice Type: RFSO)
- Competitive tendering

## Selection Criteria
The Standing Offers will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following free trade agreements:
- The Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- The Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- The Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement 
- The Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- The Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Closing of the Tender Document
This is an expired tender notice. For clarity, please download and review the tender documentation at [link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19897462] for further information. [Please contact Tania Boyer at tania.boyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca if you require any assistance.]
